stats.pets: {count, plural, =0 {No pets available} one {# pet available} other {# pets available ({{dogs}} dogs, {{cats}} cats)}}

pet.status: {gender, select, male {He is} female {She is} other {They are}} {age, plural, =0 {newborn} one {# year old} other {# years old}}
pet.adoption: {gender, select, male {He was} female {She was}} adopted by {customerGender, select, male {Mr.} female {Ms.} other {Mx.}} {{customerName}}

customer.greeting: {gender, select, male {He is} female {She is} other {They are}} looking for {count, plural, =0 {any pet} one {# pet} other {# pets}}
customer.preference: {gender, select, male {He prefers} female {She prefers} other {They prefer}} {petType, select, dog {dogs} cat {cats} bird {birds} other {any pets}}
customer.history: {gender, select, male {He has} female {She has} other {They have}} adopted {count, plural, =0 {no pets yet} one {# pet} other {# pets}}

formatting.important: <highlight>Important Notice:</highlight> All pets must be vaccinated
formatting.mixed: Your pet's health is our <highlight>number <emphasis>one</emphasis> priority</highlight>
